text:
Mass shootings in the U.S. have become painfully familiar. We can’t allow more lives to be lost. We need action. Today, I’m joining @OversightDems for a hearing to examine how Congress can enact legislation that will #EndGunViolence and save lives. 
https://t.co/cEJOVfoB1O

We must act now. Acting now will take courage. Now is the time to get life-saving pieces of gun violence prevention legislation like the Protecting Our Children Act across the finish line. Now is the time to #EndGunViolence & join @HouseDemocrats in our commitment to save lives. https://t.co/sLWG8TvMdT
This is what momentum looks like for the Judiciary Act, which expands #SCOTUS @RepJerryNadler @RepMondaire @SenMarkey https://t.co/TyuViMuBUj https://t.co/Mezuqr3FHs

As we mark Gun Violence Awareness Day, I am taking a moment to remember those we have lost to the epidemic of gun violence in America. It’s time to take action to #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/uoO1fBUdKV

.@HouseJudiciary My friends, history will not forget those politicians and phony patriots who cared more about maintaining their grip on power and serving the interest of the NRA than they did about protecting our kids from out-of-control gun violence. https://t.co/BK6WYDSL8x
